Translation: You're afraid to pull up the net, aren't you?
I always bathe in this river.
I said (to myself), “Kaywerye evidently doesn't like me”.
I almost go (but I am not going to go).

Sentence: onɨ wyaro nkekonɨ bɨryekomo, tɨyonɨ wya
Segmentation: onɨ wjaro n-ka-jakonɨ bɨrʲekomo tɨ-jonɨ wja
Translation: This is what the boy said to his mother.
Pass my greetings to your children.
Do you think it is gonna rain?
